H0.text: Microscope is the best tool for students to observe and measure plant cells.

H1.text: Hand lens is the best tool for students to observe and measure plant cells.

H2.text: Metric ruler is the best tool for students to observe and measure plant cells.

A4.text: Microscopy is the science of investigating small objects and structures using a microscope.

A5.text: Microscopes can produce three-dimensional images of objects, including biological materials that have not been chemically fixed.
